\ The main objective of this system, is to reduce the consumption of time during maintaining the records of teachers, students. At the end of the day for any college is the dissemination of information in an environment that encourages accountability, relevance and retention of the information gathered. Such are the main objectives of a college administrator, who, as a student manager, is charged with allowing this opportunity and environment to occur on behalf of the students. Our System also provides an easy way not only to automate some functionalities of a college-student, but also to provide the functional reports to top management of college with the finest of details about those such aspect of college. This project is designed to remove all the deficiency of the current system.

 ❑ In order to achieve our objectives following functions are essential for “eleve portail”: 

 I. This project contains various sections. One section is for managing master record. It includes department, course, semester etc.

 II. Other section is for managing student, faculty and exam.
